title: What are your thoughts on this hate ?
selftext:
Hindus are only left in india , Nepal and Bangladesh…. That too 
Every year Hindus have to face persecution in Pakistan and Bangladesh ….
America have sanctioned Bangladesh many time because of human rights issue on Hindus ….

Still such hate …

As per me , people who converts to Islam or Christianity they change their name , dressings , languages etc etc 
Straight to the point they forget their culture and start following Arabic and European culture ….
They (converts) will abuse their own historical identity (ram , Krishna , budha , gurunanak , Mahaveer , etc etc ) ,  hate and never celebrate the festivals related to Indian historical identity (Diwali , Janmashtami , Holi , etc ) but will celebrate Arabic and European characters ( Hassan , Jesus , etc ) 


This is same happened with america , Australia , Africa etc 
Today we don’t know what culture they followed , today we don’t even know the language of Australia properly they speak English …

Now you may think , what’s problem in everyone speaking following etc one language , one culture etc 


Then just think about this planet ….
This planet itself is not same or just one …
Every land is different , we humans itself are different our Color , height , facial features etc etc 

I hope you understand my point …

They are seeking attention. And you are giving it to them.

first off the data is wrong Hindi FR is 2.1and Muslim FR is 2.6 so manipulating data . Arabic sucker , jannat theory , cracked moon . If someone said the same on the other side he would have been roasted badly wouldn't he and you would have called it out as hate .
